title: WATCH: Tim Tebow shows off his Afrikaans while chowing droëwors: 'I'll be fluent before you know it'
text:
WATCH: Tim Tebow shows off his Afrikaans while chowing droëwors: 'I'll be fluent before you know it' share this

Johannesburg – We already knew about Tim Tebow's love of biltong and droëwors, and now we get to see it first-hand.

In an interview with Channel24 in August, Demi-Leigh opened up about her fiancé, Tim Tebow's love of South African food, which includes munching on biltong.

Now, in a video shared on his Instagram account, Tim is seen promoting droëwors and biltong as a great way to "eat clean".

"So if we have any meat lovers out there, Demi introduced me to Biltong and Droëwors from South Africa… and they're amazing! If you like to eat clean, and your on the go a lot, these are great options [sic]," Tim captioned the clip.

In the video, the couple, who are engaged and will be tying the knot soon, are sitting on a couch as they enjoy the local snack. Tim also takes this time to show off some of the Afrikaans words and phrases Demi-Leigh has taught him.
